en.name: Vendor(s) Coverage
en.subtitle: Coverage for vendors operating or offering a service at your event without their own insurance

en.name: Room / Space Rental Event Coverage
en.subtitle: Coverage for events that are renting a space such as a birthday party room, meeting room, wedding, park event etc

en.name: Sporting Event Coverage
en.subtitle: Coverage for sporting events ranging from hourly coverage, to seasonal / league coverage, camps and tournaments.

en.name: Coach / Instructor Coverage
en.subtitle: Coverage for events where an instructor / coach is teaching participants.
